comments:
Build 200403260300   Eclipse M8 200403261517

The C/C++ Search does not work when pressing the "Search" button in the Search 
dialog.  The dialog stays up and no results are shown. 

There is a problem with the compability of the background search feature

We had this exception in the .log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 29, 2004 08:41:02.109

undefined for the type NewSearchUI

There were changes to the NewSearchUI class in M8, changes were made to the

- Bogdan
